widgets.title: Azure Storage Containers without SecureTransport Enabled - OK

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find azure_storage_container that has azure_storage_account WITH enableHttpsTrafficOnly!=true as bucket
return bucket.tag.AccountName as name, count(bucket) as value

widgets.title: Azure Storage Containers without default encryption enabled - OK

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find azure_storage_container with encrypted != true as bucket
return bucket.tag.AccountName as name, count(bucket) as value

widgets.title: Azure Storage Containers without any logging enabled

queries.name: query1
queries.query: Find azure_storage_container that has azure_storage_account WITH blobAnalyticsLoggingWriteEnabled!=true

widgets.title: Azure Storage Containers with SecureTransport Enabled - OK

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find azure_storage_container that has azure_storage_account WITH enableHttpsTrafficOnly=true as bucket
return bucket.tag.AccountName as name, count(bucket) as value

widgets.title: Azure Storage Containers with default encryption enabled - OK

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find azure_storage_container with encrypted = true as bucket
return bucket.tag.AccountName as name, count(bucket) as value
